entries.assist_16: C'mon people! Let's work together here!
entries.assist_15: Move it! Into rows or something!
entries.assist_12: Steady...we don't want them to rush us.
entries.assist_8: Pin them down! We can do it!
entries.assist_3: Take them out one at a time!
entries.hit_target_16: Give up now, and I might let you live.
entries.hit_target_14: Better run away while you still can!
entries.hit_target_12: It's hard making this look so easy.
entries.hit_target_8: Stand up and take it, coward!
entries.ally_16: Let me even the odds a little...
entries.ally_15: You OK, friend? Let me take care of this...
entries.ally_13: I don't care who you are, you don't touch my friends.
entries.ally_12: Hey now! Leave my friend alone!
entries.ally_10: Well, well. Guess it's time for me to step in here.
entries.ally_9: You look like you could use some help.
entries.ally_7: Pick on someone your own size!
entries.ally_6: You coward! Whyn't you pick on me instead, huh?
entries.ally_5: Just a second! What are you doing?!
entries.ally_2: Don't lay a finger on my friends...!
entries.help_7: I can't handle this on my own!
entries.help_5: Not to bother anyone, but... HELP!
entries.help_2: I could use some help over here...
entries.attacked_16: I hope your affairs are all in order.
entries.attacked_13: So, you want to pick on helpless old me, eh?
entries.attacked_12: Start running now, you might get away.
entries.attacked_11: It's a good day to die.
entries.attacked_8: Better run. I make short work of my enemies.
entries.attacked_7: I hear you're expected in the afterlife.
entries.attacked_6: When you die, I will treasure your possessions always.
entries.attacked_5: Well, I guess dying in bed is boring anyway.
entries.attacked_4: I hope you weren't looking forward to old age.
entries.attacked_3: Next time I'm invited to a fight, I'm planning on being busy.
entries.attacked_2: Tougher enemies than you have tried to kill me.
entries.hit_12: Where's a medic when you need one?
entries.hit_9: Go on, try to do that again.
entries.hit_8: That the best you can do?
entries.hit_7: Nice try, but I'm still here!
entries.hit_6: Oooh, now you're making me mad.
entries.hit_3: It'll take more than that to take me down!
entries.gloat_11: I hate having to kill people.
entries.gloat_9: Next time, bring lots of friends.
entries.gloat_7: Somebody better clean up the mess.
entries.gloat_6: Ha! Think you can take ME on, eh?
entries.death_13: Is that all the time I get?
entries.death_9: You'll never be rid of me...
entries.threat_16: You look like a candidate for target practice.
entries.threat_15: I'm the quickest blaster in the system, you know. You better back off.
entries.threat_14: Your entrails would look nice spread out on the ground...
entries.threat_13: Just give me an excuse to kill you!
entries.threat_12: You won't like my fist in your face. But that's what you'll get if you come any closer.
entries.threat_11: You want a taste of this?
entries.threat_10: Your head would look nice in my trophy case.
entries.threat_9: Look, I'm drawing a line in the sand. Don't come any closer, or...
entries.threat_6: Back off, or I'll have to do something you'll regret.
entries.threat_5: If you know what's good for you, you'll get out of here.
entries.threat_4: This is a dangerous place for you to be.
entries.threat_3: You better clear on out of here!
entries.bye_mean_16: Well, now that the smell's gone...
entries.bye_mean_15: If you hadn't left, I'd probably make you.
entries.bye_mean_14: Here's hoping you have a nasty accident.
entries.bye_mean_11: About time you slunk out of here.
entries.bye_mean_6: If I see you around later, you'll regret it.
entries.bye_mean_5: Bye, and don't let the door hit you on the way out.
entries.bye_mean_3: Your kind's not welcome around here.
entries.bye_mid_16: OK, I have to go too. Bye!
entries.bye_mid_15: You're leaving? Well, I'm sure we'll catch up again sometime.
entries.bye_mid_14: Places to go, people to see? Bye!
entries.bye_mid_13: Got somewhere to be? See you later.
entries.bye_mid_4: I'm sure I'll see you again.
entries.bye_nice_16: I wish you didn't have to leave. Goodbye.
entries.bye_nice_15: I hate to see you go...
entries.bye_nice_14: Glad to see you, sorry to see you go.
entries.bye_nice_13: Always nice to see you. Come back soon!
entries.bye_nice_12: Leaving? Too bad. I'll see you around.
entries.bye_nice_9: I hope I'll see you again.
entries.bye_nice_8: It was great to see you!
entries.bye_nice_7: It was really nice to see you.
entries.hi_mean_15: Oh, it's you. There goes the neighborhood.
entries.hi_mean_14: You aren't welcome around here, you know.
entries.hi_mean_13: Well, well. If it isn't a scumbag come to say hello.
entries.hi_mean_10: If you know what's good for you, you'll leave before I get angry.
entries.hi_mean_9: Oh brother. What do YOU want?
entries.hi_mean_7: What are you doing skulking around here?
entries.hi_mean_4: I'd say hello, but why bother being polite?
entries.hi_mean_3: Do I smell something? Oh, it's you.
entries.hi_mid_15: Ah, yes. Can I help you?
entries.hi_nice_16: Hello there! Can I help you?
entries.hi_nice_15: Well, well, look who it is!
entries.hi_nice_11: Hello! Very nice to see you.
entries.hi_nice_8: You're a sight for sore eyes!
entries.flee_16: How do I get myself into these situations?
entries.flee_13: Time to get out of here...!
entries.flee_12: Got to get out of here...
entries.calm_16: Looks like the danger has passed.
entries.alert_7: I have a bad feeling about this...
entries.alert_6: I've got a bad feeling about this...
entries.calm_5: Relax.  Relax.  I'm going to my happy place.
entries.calm_4: Ok, I can settle down now.  Whew.
entries.calm_2: Ok, calm down.  It's all right.
entries.flee_4: Get out of the way!  Run!
